title: Letter Case, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: leather, silk
Technique: counted stitch embroidery
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Letter case or pocket book with tooled brown leather covers. Inside covers have silk panels embroidered with multicolored silks in counted stitch embroidery. One side has an urn with weeping willow tree, the other a wreath of flowers with the initials J.B.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letter Case, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: leather, silk
Technique: counted stitch embroidery. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1925-1-51.
